thread.title: This ultimate sports fan is streaming golf while attending the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: This ultimate sports fan is streaming golf while attending the Super Bowl

author: Molly Podlesny
title: This ultimate sports fan is streaming golf while attending the Super Bowl
text: This ultimate sports fan is streaming golf while attending the Super Bowl BECAUSE ONE SPORT ISN’T ENOUGH Sometimes, one sport is just not enough, even if that sport is the LITERAL MOST IMPORTANT SPORTING EVENT OF THE YEAR. Dude in the stadium is watching golf while waiting for the #SuperBowl to begin pic.twitter.com/Zi9KsvaD3s — Ashok Moore (@AshokaESPN) February 5, 2017 This man is like all of us on our phones tweeting the game, only he’s actually gone another step further by bringing a tablet and watching a whole different sport. But wait, before you call this man out for not being a dedicated football fan: Update: now he's watching golf but busted out the binoculars to get a close-up view of Brady #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/7VC4GK1k8d — Ashok Moore (@AshokaESPN) February 5, 2017 He really does care about the Super Bowl too! This guy is really just a full-on sports addict. We salute you sir, and your dedication to the game(s). In this Storystream
